name: ...So I Walked Into the Saloon
description:
...So I Walked Into the Saloon is a choice-based point n click Western that takes place entirely within one room.

You take the role of a nameless stranger entering this town's saloon.  Click on tables/characters to interact with them. Uncover their secrets, push them on certain tracks. See how the chips fall, then do it all again.

Controls:

Click on tables/characters to interact with them.

Click on choices/the dialogue box to advance the story.

Press 'ESC' to quite.

Press 'R' to restart.

Credits: 

Pistol sound: 40 Smith and Wesson by Mike Koenig - https://soundcloud.com/59nxyejat3xt/40-smith-wesson-single-mike-koenig

Rifle Sound: Gun Fire sound by GoodSoundsForYou - http://soundbible.com/1998-Gun-Fire.html

Shotgun Sound: Old-School shotgun by RA The Sun God - https://soundbible.com/1960-Shotgun-Old-School.html

Background Music: 

Maple Leaf Rag by Kevin MacLeod

License: http://creativecommons.org/licenses/by/4.0/
